channel.title: Trade Bug
channel.description: When I have a player trade each other it works perfectly, but when a player trades a second time and the trade is accepted from both partys if it is your second time trading your client will disconnect, Does anyone have any solutions to this bug? Im an excelent coder and find that I can fix any bug in any server, but as it turns out this is the only one I actualy really need help on, there are no "disconnect = true" in my trade code so if anyone has ever had that problem please PM me or post it thanks.

item.title: Trade Bug
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

-.- people stop flaming
if your such a “good programer” fix it yourself mk?
its ok to deny that you arent try posting some errors that you get while your trying to fix it
if that doesnt work post the errors here and then go back to trial by error till you get it perfect

Read full topic

item.title: Trade Bug

item.description:
@durent wrote:

When I have a player trade each other it works perfectly, but when a player trades a second time and the trade is accepted from both partys if it is your second time trading your client will disconnect, Does anyone have any solutions to this bug? Im an excelent coder and find that I can fix any bug in any server, but as it turns out this is the only one I actualy really need help on, there are no “disconnect = true” in my trade code so if anyone has ever had that problem please PM me or post it thanks.
